DOC.brief_summary: The investigators hypothesize that Klacid modified release (MR) shortens symptom recovery time in Thai patients with upper or lower respiratory tract infections.
DOC.brief_title: Recovery Time in Thai Patients With Upper or Lower Respiratory Tract Infections Treated With Klacid MR
